attributes.action: Demand Tony Blairs resignation of (post Chilcot report) from the Labour Party.
attributes.background:
The Chilcot report proves that Tony Blair was at fault and the threat of weapons of mass destruction was misrepresented, and Tony Blair is responsible for allowing a massive loss of life. He should therefore stand down as a member of the Labour party 
, so as not to defame the party's credibility.

rejection.details:
The Government and Parliament are not responsible for party political matters. If you want Labour to eject Mr Blair, you can contact them here:

http://www.labour.org.uk/pages/contact
